# [Interview #16: Letter to R. S. Cerveny, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=16#5)

#### Robert Jordan

Again, thanks for your letter.

With best wishes, I remain,
  

sincerely,

Robert Jordan
